dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This survey focuses on President Clinton and the November Congressional Election. Issues addressed include approval of President Clinton, allegations against him, impeachment vote, Congressional elections, ethical standards of professionals, federal budget, and crime. Demographic data include marital status, religion, employment status, age, sex, education, race, party affiliation, political ideology, and income.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The survey used a modified probability sample of adults.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: II;
